newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Rotterdam port expansion plan decision tomorrow.
newsitem.headline: Rotterdam port expansion plan decision tomorrow.

text.p: A decision on whether to go ahead with port expansion and land reclamation plans in Rotterdam is expected on July 11, a spokesman from the Dutch Ministry of Transport said on Thursday.
"We are optimistic on a positive decision," he added.
If the project gets the go-ahead, the two possible options are a 500 hectare reclaimed area without a harbour or a 1,000 hectare site including a harbour.
The Dutch ministry is also due to decide on the amount of land that will be set-aside for a nature reserve.
